message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you a reasonable 30% of the pot to start.
Alice, my turn. I'm aiming for a more balanced split this time. Let's avoid further delays and potential losses.
Bob, this is a better offer than your last. The longer we wait, the less your share will be worth. Let's settle this now.
Alice, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains. Let's end this with a fair 50/50 split before inflation eats away at the value any further.
